import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Post } from 'src/app/types/post'; @Component({ selector: 'app-post-details', templateUrl: './post-details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./post-details.component.css'] }) export class PostDetailsComponent { @Input() currentPost!: Post }
